oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Use of Plastic Buttons for Repair of Vaginal Prolapse in the Cow
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dixon, Joe
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: use of plastic buttons
repair of vaginal prolapse
cow
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: There have been quite a number of different methods for repairing vaginal prolapse in the cow and a lot of the difficulties are in that cow that is going to calve. I was taught in school by Dr. Lewis Moe who was an instructor at that time to use overcoat buttons. But overcoat buttons are difficult to find any more, and since plastic came out I have been cutting out plastic serum bottles or plastic buttons.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1983; 180
